title: Party City USA, Woman Weaponizes Whiteness 5.27.20
itunes:title: Party City USA, Woman Weaponizes Whiteness 5.27.20
description:
In episode 638, Jack and Miles are joined by the Randy and Jason Sklar to discuss people's lack of social distancing on Memorial Day weekend, misinformation being spread about coronavirus, this week in racist white women behavior, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. No social distance here: Videos show Americans packing parks, beaches for Memorial Day
  2. Florida scientist says she was ousted after refusing to manipulate state’s COVID-19 data
  3. 'I'm looking for the truth': States face criticism for COVID-19 data cover-ups
  4. WATCH: Unmasking The Science You Aren’t Hearing On TV | COVID-19 Facts from the Frontline | Tony Robbins
  5. A white woman apologized after calling police on a black man and saying 'there's an African American man threatening my life'
  6. No, Covering Your Face To Keep Out The COVID-19 Isn’t Slavery
  7. Night of a Thousand Sklars - Live Stand-Up Comedy with the Sklar Brothers
  8. WATCH: Metronomy - Summer Jam

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
